name: qs_dart
desc: A faithful, cross‑port implementation of Node.js qs for Dart.

name: DateSerializer
desc:
Hook to stringify a DateTime before it goes through the Encoder.
Return a plain, unencoded string; the encoder will percent‑encode it.

name: DecodeKind
desc: Decoding context used by the query string parser and utilities.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: DecodeOptions
desc: Options that configure the output of QS.decode.

name: allowDots
desc: When true, decode dot notation in keys: a.b=c → {a: {b: "c"}}.

name: allowEmptyLists
desc:
When true, allow empty list values to be produced from inputs like
a[]= without coercing or discarding them.

name: charset
desc:
Character encoding used to decode percent‑encoded bytes in the input.
Only utf8 and latin1 are supported.

name: charsetSentinel
desc: Enable opt‑in charset detection via a utf8=✓ sentinel parameter.

name: comma
desc:
Parse the entire input as a comma‑separated value instead of key/value
pairs. Nested maps (e.g., a={b:1},{c:d}) are not supported in this
mode.

name: copyWith
desc: Return a new DecodeOptions with the provided overrides.

name: decode
desc: Unified scalar decode with key/value context.

name: decodeDotInKeys
desc: Decode dots that appear in keys (e.g., a.b=c).

name: decodeKey
desc: Convenience: decode a key and coerce the result to String (or null).

name: decodeValue
desc: Convenience: decode a value token.

name: decoder
desc: Deprecated: use decode. This wrapper will be removed in a future release.

name: delimiter
desc:
Delimiter used to split key/value pairs. May be a String (e.g., "&")
or a RegExp for pattern‑based splitting.

name: depth
desc:
Maximum nesting depth when constructing maps from bracket notation.
The default (5) is a protective limit against abuse; raise it only when
you control the inputs.

name: duplicates
desc: Strategy to apply when the same key appears multiple times.

name: ignoreQueryPrefix
desc: Ignore a leading ? query prefix if present.

name: interpretNumericEntities
desc: Interpret HTML numeric entities like &#...; in tokens before decoding.

name: listLimit
desc: Maximum list size/index that will be honored when decoding bracket lists.

name: parameterLimit
desc:
Maximum number of parameters to parse before applying limits.
Defaults to 1000 to guard against excessively long inputs.

name: parseLists
desc:
Disable list parsing entirely when false (treat bracket indices as
string keys).

name: props
desc:
The list of properties that will be used to determine whether
two instances are equal.

name: strictDepth
desc:
When true, exceeding depth results in a thrown error instead of a
soft limit.

name: strictNullHandling
desc:
When true, tokens without an = (e.g., ?flag) decode to null
rather than "".

name: throwOnLimitExceeded
desc: When true, exceeding limits throws instead of applying a soft cap.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: validate
desc: Validates option invariants (used by QS.decode and direct decoder calls).

name: Decoder
desc: Decoding options for QS.decode.

name: Duplicates
desc: Strategy to resolve repeated keys when decoding a query string.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: EncodeOptions
desc: Options that configure the output of QS.encode.

name: addQueryPrefix
desc: Set to true to add a question mark ? prefix to the encoded output.

name: allowDots
desc: Set to true to use dot Map notation in the encoded output.

name: allowEmptyLists
desc: Set to true to allow empty Lists in the encoded output.

name: charset
desc: The character encoding to use.

name: charsetSentinel
desc:
Set to true to announce the character by including an utf8=✓ parameter
with the proper encoding of the checkmark, similar to what Ruby on Rails
and others do when submitting forms.

name: commaCompactNulls
desc: When listFormat is ListFormat.comma, drop null items before joining.

name: commaRoundTrip
desc:
When listFormat is set to ListFormat.comma, you can also set
commaRoundTrip option to true or false, to append [] on
single-item Lists, so that they can round trip through a parse.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a new EncodeOptions instance with updated values.

name: delimiter
desc: The delimiter to use when joining key-value pairs in the encoded output.

name: encode
desc: Set to false to disable encoding.

name: encodeDotInKeys
desc: Encode Map keys using dot notation by setting encodeDotInKeys to true:

name: encodeValuesOnly
desc: Encoding can be disabled for keys by setting the encodeValuesOnly to true

name: encoder
desc: Encodes a value to a String.

name: filter
desc:
Use the filter option to restrict which keys will be included in the encoded output.
If you pass a Function, it will be called for each key to obtain the replacement value.
If you pass a List, it will be used to select properties and List indices to be encoded.

name: format
desc:
The encoding format to use.
The default format is Format.rfc3986 which encodes ' ' to %20
which is backward compatible.
You can also set format to Format.rfc1738 which encodes ' ' to +.

name: formatter
desc: Convenience getter for accessing the format's Format.formatter

name: listFormat
desc: The List encoding format to use.

name: props
desc:
The list of properties that will be used to determine whether
two instances are equal.

name: serializeDate
desc: Serializes a DateTime instance to a String.

name: skipNulls
desc: Set to true to completely skip encoding keys with null values

name: sort
desc: Set a Sorter to affect the order of parameter keys.

name: strictNullHandling
desc:
Set to true to distinguish between null values and empty Strings.
This way the encoded string null values will have no = sign.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: validate
desc: Validates the encoding options, throwing ArgumentError on invalid values.

name: Encoder
desc: Encoders, sorters, and the immutable EncodeOptions used by qs_dart.

name: Format
desc: Output formatting strategies applied after RFC 3986 percent-encoding.

name: formatter
desc: The normalization function applied to each percent-encoded token.

name: toString
desc: Returns the case name ("rfc1738" / "rfc3986"), handy for logging.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Formatter
desc:
Signature for a post–percent-encoding formatter that normalizes a single
URI component string.

name: LegacyDecoder
desc: Back‑compat adapter for (value, charset) -> Any? decoders.

name: ListFormat
desc: Shapes how list/array keys are written during query-string encoding.

name: generator
desc:
Returns a function that transforms a container prefix (e.g. "foo")
and an optional element key into the key path for a single list item.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: ListFormatGenerator
desc:
Signature used by ListFormat to construct the key path for a single
element in a list during encoding.

name: QS
desc: QS (Dart)

name: decode
desc: Decode a query string or a pre-parsed map into a structured map.

name: encode
desc: Encode a map/iterable into a query string.

name: Sentinel
desc: Sentinels for signalling the character set of form/query submissions.

name: encoded
desc: Fully encoded query fragment to append, including the utf8= key.

name: toString
desc: Returns the encoded query fragment (same as encoded).

name: value
desc: Unencoded form control value (as it would appear in the page/DOM).

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: Sorter
desc:
3‑way comparator to impose a deterministic order on keys (‑1/0/+1).
Returning values outside that set will be signum‑clamped by callers.

name: Undefined
desc: Sentinel used to distinguish between a missing value and an explicit null.

name: Undefined.new
desc: Creates a new sentinel instance. All instances are equal.

name: copyWith
desc: No-op copy that returns another equal sentinel. Kept for API symmetry.

name: props
desc: No distinguishing fields — all Undefined instances are equal.

name: UriExtension
desc: Extensions that integrate qs_dart with Uri.

name: queryParametersQs
desc: Decodes the raw query string into a Map<String, dynamic> using QS.decode.

name: toStringQs
desc: Returns a normalized string for this Uri with the query encoded by QS.encode.

name: decode
desc: Top-level convenience functions that mirror the JavaScript qs API.

name: encode
desc: Encode a Dart object into a query string (convenience for QS.encode).
